Aish, Robert: Tools do not exist in isolation. Tools require complementary skills to be effectively used. A computational tool requires cognitive skills. With this in mind we might summarise the mission of SG (Smartgeometry): to encourage the development of those cognitive and creative skills that matched the geometric and computational possibilities of a new generation of design software.
